moves.name: Defog
moves.effect: Clears the entire field of terrain effects. Clears all field effects from the opponents’ field of play. Lowers the target’s evasiveness by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Spotlight, Please!
moves.effect: Makes opponents target the user for a short time. Raises the user’s Defense by 3 stat ranks. Raises the user’s Sp. Atk by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Atk by 1 stat rank.

syncMove.name: Miracle Idol Draco Meteor
syncMove.description: Become Mega Altaria until the end of battle. This move’s power increases when there are no field effects on the opponents’ field of play and also no effects on the entire field of play, including weather or terrain effects.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 9
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by one when it is hit by an attack move.

passives.name: HP Trade-Off 5
passives.description: The smaller the user’s percentage of remaining HP, the more it powers up the user’s moves.

passives.name: Pressure Cooker 1
passives.description: Once per battle, has a chance (20%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when in a pinch.
